data.title: Blade Runner 2; The Edge of Human
data.meta_description: Norwalk, Connecticut: Easton Press, 1995. First edition. Full Leather. 23.5 x 15.5 cm. Octavo. 340pp. Bound into full dark blue leather with gilt design, lettering, and foredges. 6 raised bands to spine, moire endpapers, silk ribbon. Stated first edition, signed by the author. There is some discoloration to the edges of the moire endpapers. Near Fine. Item #76246
data.text: Norwalk, Connecticut: Easton Press, 1995. First edition. Full Leather. 23.5 x 15.5 cm.
